content: "Cosa?", chiese Pharamp. "Niente", mentì Sysko, "stavamo parlando dell'effetto del confucianesimo sul socialismo cinese moderno."
translations: eng:What﹖ Pharamp asked. Nothing, Sysko lied, we were talking about the effect of Confucianism on modern Chinese socialism
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
